dc_creator_sm: New York City Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: The New York City tax lot base map is part of the Department of City Planning's ongoing COGIS project. The tax lots in conjuction with the tax blocks provide a schematic overview of New York City's tax geography. The tax lots are available in MapInfo .TAB and ESRI Shapefile formats.
dc_publisher_s: New York (NY) Department of City Planning
